channel.title: Models on Zen LM
channel.description: Recent content in Models on Zen LM

item.title: Zen4 Ultra: 480B Parameters, 1M Token Context
item.description: Zen4 Ultra is our most capable model: 480B total parameters, 35B active per token, 1M token context window. Benchmark results and use cases.

item.title: Introducing Zen LM: Open Frontier Models from Hanzo AI and Zoo Labs
item.description: Announcing the Zen model family: 94+ open models built on Zen MoDE architecture, co-developed by Hanzo AI and Zoo Labs Foundation.

item.title: Zen 3.0: The Next Generation of Open AI
item.description: Announcing Zen 3.0, our most capable open model family yet.
